author: christopheralanwest
body:
#### PR description:

This PR updates the pixel templates used for zero-field 2021 MC with a different radiation damage assumption. Please see the [HN thread](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4313/1/1.html) and references therein for details.

The GT diffs are:

**2021 design**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun3_2021_design_v4/112X_mcRun3_2021_design_v5 

**2021 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v4/112X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v5 

**2021 cosmics**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun3_2021cosmics_realistic_deco_v4/112X_mcRun3_2021cosmics_realistic_deco_v5 

**2021 heavy ion**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_HI_v4/112X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_HI_v5 

#### PR validation:

Please see the [HN thread](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4313/1/1.html) and references therein for details.

In addition, a technical test was performed: `runTheMatrix.py -l limited,12024.0,7.23,159.0,7.24 --ibeos`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This is not a backport but will be backported to 11_1_X.
title: Modified radiation damage assumption for 2021 0T pixel templates
